docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: HttpAuthBasic模块 #!/usr/bin/perl use strict; my $pw=$ARGV[0] ; print crypt($pw,$pw). \n ;
docs.title: HttpAuthBasic模块

docs.text: 负载均衡 nginx使用upstream配置进行负载均衡，自带简单的轮询均衡 1. 轮询 2. ip_hash upstream配置 轮询 通过weight进行权重的配置 upstream backend { server localhost:8080 weight=3; server localhost:8082; } ip_hash 使用down下线服务 upstream backend{ ip_hash; server localhost:8080; server localhost:8082 down; } server配置 server { location / { proxy_pass http://backend; } }
docs.title: 负载均衡

docs.text: nginx使用upstream配置进行负载均衡，自带简单的轮询均衡 1. 轮询 2. ip_hash
docs.title: 负载均衡

docs.text: 通过weight进行权重的配置 upstream backend { server localhost:8080 weight=3; server localhost:8082; }
docs.title: 轮询

docs.text: 使用down下线服务 upstream backend{ ip_hash; server localhost:8080; server localhost:8082 down; }
docs.title: ip_hash
